title: KüA Plan Entry
description: A single entry of the KüA plan

id.description: The unique identifier of the entry

title.description: The subject of the planned KüA (or reservation)

comment.description: A short explanatory comment to be shown together with the subject.

description.description: A longer description of the planned KüA, formatted as Markdown.

timeComment.description: A short comment about the KüA's time (e.g. start after another KüA, "open end", etc.).

room.description: List of unique identifiers of the rooms this entry is valid for.

roomComment.description: A short comment about the KüA's room (e.g. the meeting point or which part of the room).

responsiblePerson.description: Name of the persons responsible for this KüA or blocker

isRoomReservation.description: if present and true, this is not a real KüA announcement, but instead an informative entry to mark this time slot in this room as reserved for some reason (e.g. some non-public meeting).

isExclusive.description: if present and true, this KüA (possibly together with other entries) exclusively blocks its interval for other KüAs (e.g. a mandatory plenum or reserved time slot for talks).

isCancelled.description: if present and true, this is not a KüA announcement, but instead informs that his plan entry is no longer valid.

category.description: Unique identifier of a Category of this event

previousDates.description: List of former places/times for which the KüA was scheduled to take place.
